code: import"./Hero.css";import Carousel from"react-material-ui-carousel";import{Paper}from"@mui/material";import{FontAwesomeIcon}from"@fortawesome/react-fontawesome";import{faCirclePlay}from"@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons";import{Link,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import Button from"react-bootstrap/Button";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Hero(_ref){let{filteredMovies}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();function Reviews(movieId){navigate("/Reviews/".concat(movieId));}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel,{children:filteredMovies&&filteredMovies.map(movie=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Paper,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"movie-card-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"movie-card",style:{"--img":"url(".concat(movie.backdrops[0],")")},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"movie-detail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"movie-poster",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:movie.poster,alt:""})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"movie-title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:movie.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"movie-buttons-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/Trailer/".concat(movie.trailerLink.substring(movie.trailerLink.length-11)),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"play-button-icon-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{className:"play-button-icon",icon:faCirclePlay})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"movie-review-button-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"warning",onClick:()=>Reviews(movie.imdbId),children:"Reviews"})})]})]})})})},movie.imdbId);})})});}export default Hero;
